channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Preorder Sony’s PS5 Pro (Before a Scalper Bot Does)
item.description: Putting any new console on reserve before an army of opportunistic bots can be challenging, but these tips can help.

item.title: Prepared, which wants to ‘revolutionize’ emergency 911 calls, raises $27M
item.description: A company that claims its tech can “revolutionize” emergency calls has raised $27 million in a Series B round led by Andreessen Horowitz. The company,...

item.title: Xiaomi 14T and 14T Pro Review: Solid but Not Snazzy
item.description: Xiaomi’s updated 14T phones have plenty to offer, but lack a little personality.

item.title: Amid Air Strikes and Rockets, an SMS From the Enemy
item.description: As Israel intensifies its attacks on Lebanon, eerie messages have been arriving on the phones of civilians on both sides of the border, with authoriti...

item.title: As war rages in Ukraine, investment in European defense and dual-use tech skyrockets
item.description: A new Dealroom report shows that VC investment in defense-related tech is outpacing any other type of investment across NATO member states and allies....

item.title: De-Fi Platform Studio Review: A Good Compact Recording Desk
item.description: This is a gorgeous recording studio centerpiece, but it might not be the best choice if your desk needs to serve multiple functions.

item.title: Peak XV has reaped $1.2B in the year since it split from Sequoia
item.description: Peak XV Partners, the largest India-focused venture fund, has realized about $1.2 billion in exits since it separated from Sequoia last year. © 2024 T...

item.title: After is a new dating app that tries to tackle ghosting
item.description: A new female-founded dating app called After is launching in Austin, Texas on Thursday with the mission of tackling ghosting and holding people accoun...

item.title: 8 Best Shower Water Filters, WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested leading filtered showerheads, from Jolie to Canopy to Sproos. The winners were clear.

item.title: The Tor Project merges with Tails, a Linux-based portable OS focused on privacy
item.description: The Tor Project is merging operations with Tails, a portable Linux-based operating system focused on preserving user privacy and anonymity. © 2024 Tec...
